attributes.action: Keep Canterbury Christ church University Midwifery course
attributes.additional_details:
There is a shortage nationwide of midwives. 
By allowing the Canterbury Christchurch University Midwifery course to be cancelled is a disservice to the local trusts and thousands of women and families who desperately need newly qualified midwives.
attributes.background: Help to prevent the course being cancelled by the National Midwifery Council

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what courses to offer are a matter for individual universities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
